org.forgerock.openidm.sync.impl

Class SynchronizationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.sync.impl.SynchronizationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.json.resource.SingletonResourceProvider, ScheduledService

    public class SynchronizationService
extends Object
implements org.forgerock.json.resource.SingletonResourceProvider, ScheduledService
    The resource provider for requests on /sync. Dispatches actions to synchronize between source and targets listed in the synchronization mappings described by the injected Mappings. Also supports invocation as a ScheduledService.

        ScheduledService interface for supporting scheduled recon.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface ScheduledService
        Parameters:
        context - the Context to use for the request

        Throws:
        ExecutionException - if execution of the scheduled work failed. Implementations can also throw RuntimeExceptions which will get logged.
